entry.content:
Introducción

Hace algunos siglos, diferentes organizaciones en Europa y Asia fueron acusadas de conspiraciones y polémicas. La mayoría de estas acusaciones fueron provocados por la información que estas sectas o grupos guardaban para sí mismos. Mito o realidad, lo que no se puede negar es que en la Edad Media, el conocimiento era algo considerado hermético y exclusivo de ciertos grupos y esa sabiduría estaba restringida a ellos y los miembros exclusivos de su círculo.

Afortunadamente, las cosas han cambiado en las últimas décadas y en esta era de información, tenemos más acceso a cosas que no podríamos haber imaginado unos pocos hace años que. Por otro lado, puede resultar chocante y paradójico que en esta era, somos menos cultos e informados.


“Si el dinero es tu esperanza de independencia nunca lo conseguirás. La única seguridad que un hombre puede tener en este mundo es una reserva de conocimiento, experiencia y habilidad” - Henry Ford


El conocimiento es motivación suficiente para que la mayoría de nosotros aprendamos sobre nuevos temas, pero aparte que si te digo que aparte de aprender temas interesantes y tecnologías de punta también puede ser recompensado?

Como se discutió en artículos anteriores, la mejor inversión que puede hacer es aprendizaje. Es innegable los beneficios que trae el aprendizaje continuo a largo plazo.

Aunque el aprendizaje por sí mismo ya es una experiencia gratificante y motivadora, algunas personas también valorarán beneficios adicionales. Mantenernos actualizados es importante en el mundo competitivo en el que todos vivimos. No solo por ahora, sino para los próximos años. Por recompensa, no me refiero solo a la nueva información o los beneficios que obtiene, sino nuevos tokens, monedas, descuentos u otro tipo de beneficios que se pueden obtener.

Esta publicación no se trata solo de obtener monedas gratis, sino también de nuevas habilidades que puedes obtener y aplicar en tu mundo profesional. Profundicemos para ver cuáles son estas opciones.


Programas Learn to Earn

El primer grupo de este artículo está relacionado con aquellos programas en los que aprenda la teoría o los conceptos básicos de una cadena de bloques o token determinado. En las subsecciones a continuación, no solo aprende algo nuevo, sino que también tenga la oportunidad de ser recompensado con criptomonedas.

En la sección Learning Rewards puedes ver diferentes artículos, cursos y cuestionarios

Estos son algunos de los programas Learn to Earn más famosos que existen, donde aprendes nuevos temas interesantes y eres recompensado de diferentes maneras.

Hay que tener en cuenta que estos cursos no tienen ningún requisito como “deposita 10 para ganar 20, etc.”. Aparte de aprender y leer/ver el curso y responder a las preguntas, el único otro requisito es que en algunos casos puede necesitar para verificar y pasar los controles KYC.


Coinbase

Coinbase a veces es criticado por diferentes razones, como temas relacionados con el negocio (despido de empleados, plan de negocios) o la tarifas comerciales. Sin embargo, desde que comenzaron en 2018, han impulsado diferentes iniciativas en la comunidad crypto. Uno de los más famosos es el programa Learning Rewards, donde los usuarios pueden ganar diferentes tokens. los El proceso es bastante fácil y solo ver un video corto y responder algunas preguntas puede obtener algunos tokens gratis.

No hay sorpresas aquí y puedes cambiar tan pronto como lo recibas. los las recompensas no son una gran cantidad, pero, últimamente, tienden a ocurrir con bastante frecuencia. Independientemente de las recompensas, los videos son agradables de ver y están muy bien hechos. Además de estos videos, también podrá ver diferentes artículos.

Coinbase Detalles
Uno de los primeros en comenzar con esta iniciativa, Coinbase, sigue ofreciendo estos cursos de vez en cuando.
Coinbase Learning Rewards


Binance

Binance es, sin duda, el intercambio de criptomonedas más grande del mundo. En mi opinión, el exchange chino basado inicialmente puede ser bastante molesto con varias notificaciones diarias, pero la organización de Changpeng Zhao también promueve varias iniciativas agradables y valiosas para sus clientes.

Desde 2022, han seguido lo que comenzó Coinbase y ofrecen algunos pequeños recompensas por ver algunos videos y responder diferentes preguntas. Ahí Son varios cursos, y las recompensas son bastante pequeñas. Sin embargo, es útil y beneficioso para entender y conocer nuevos proyectos, y además de aprender y obtener nuevas ideas, ser recompensado por ello.

Binance Detalles
Binance ofrece varios cursos cortos sobre nuevas altcoins y operaciones de trading
Binance Learn and Earn


Cake DeFi

Cake DeFi es un jugador bastante nuevo en el sector de las finanzas descentralizadas y ahora bastante conocido para muchas personas. Sin embargo, con sus soluciones actuales, es probable que escuches de ellos cada vez más. Cake DeFi son una empresa DeFi con sede en Singapur especializada en ingresos pasivos, siendo los principales pilares de estas plataformas las siguientes:

1. Liquidity Mining: a diferencia de los exchanges centralizados, en un DEX, la líquidez es necesario para permitir intercambios entre los diferentes pares. Con minería de liquidez que proporciona sus activos criptográficos para que otros puedan usarlos para comercio.

2. Staking: a través del protocolo Proof of Stake, bloquea sus tokens para proteger la red., y obtienes recompensas con tokens adicionales

3. Lending: la última estrategia es el ingreso generado al prestar sus monedas a otros participantes de DeFi.

Con los cursos disponibles, en este momento puedes ganar los siguientes tokens

  • Tokens DFI (DeFiChain)
  • Tokens BTC-DFI

Ambos están asignados a la Staking y Liquidity Mining, pero después de haber hecho "unfreeze" se puedes hacer lo que se desee con las monedas que tienes ese obtuvieron en el curso más los que obtuvo del período de congelación.

Próximamente también habrá un curso relacionado con Ethereum, en el que también aprender algo nuevo y ser recompensado.

Cake DeFi Detalles
Con cuestionarios cortos, puede aprender diferentes temas de criptomonedas y finanzas descentralizadas mientras se divierte
Cake DeFi Learn


Revolut

Revolut es muy bueno para muchos aspectos, como banca, conversión de moneda, viajar y las características geniales de la aplicación, como tarjetas virtuales o transferencias instantáneas. Sin embargo, cuando se trata de sus características de inversión tales como la compra de acciones o criptomonedas, todavía hay algunos aspectos que deben ser mejorados.

Probablemente por eso, para despegar, Revolut ha lanzado Learn & Gana Programa relacionado con Polkadot. En comparación con otros cursos, las lecciones están relacionadas con una de las blockchains más importantes y la las cantidades también son más altas.

Además de los vídeos, también tienes la opción de ver el glosario, donde se explican algunos términos importantes de criptografía y blockchain.

No hay un programa de referencia aquí y obtendrá esos tokens por usted. Tú decides si los quieres vender por fiat o cambiarlos en el momento que los recibes.

Revolut Detalles
El propósito del programa es aprender sobre una criptomoneda específica y familiarizarse con el mundo de las criptomonedas..
Revolut Learn & Earn Site


Cursos Técnicos y Sitios

Aunque los cursos anteriores te recompensarán con tokens directos y los de abajo no lo harán, dada la falta de habilidades técnicas que veremos en el futuro, los cursos a continuación pueden tener una recompensa más relevante en los próximos años.

Una vez que nos hemos centrado en describir los cursos más importantes relacionados con negocios y blockchains, también podemos ser más técnicos y en este tema, también hay muy buenos cursos para sumar nuevas habilidades.


Uniswap

Uniswap, llamado así por el nombre de la empresa que lo creó, es uno de los exchanges descentralizados más famosos. Aparte del exchange y siendo un ejemplo de gobernanza, Uniswap explica claramente muy temas importantes relacionados con DeFi.

Ofrecen algunos proyectos ubicados en GitHub y la interfaz de código abierto para su protocolo está por ejemplo disponible en GitHub.

Además de estos recursos y lo que puede intercambiar o ganar en el exchange, también puede crear diferentes aplicaciones que se integran con el protocolo y obtener pagados de su programa de "grants".

Uniswap Detalles
Con la documentación detallada, se puede aprender sobre diferentes temas y contribuir a UniSwap de infinitas maneras.
Uniswap Sitio
Documentación Uniswap
Uniswap Interfaz


Ethernaut

Probablemente haya escuchado recientemente sobre la fusión de Ethereum y las consecuencias que la bifurcación puede tener no solo para la red Ethereum sino toda la escena criptográfica. Ethernaut es un juego de guerra que se juega en un Ethereum Máquina virtual y desarrollado por OpenZeppelin, Ethernaut es una aplicación Web3 desarrollada con Solidity, donde también puedes aprender este lenguaje de programación de una manera amena e interactiva.

El propósito del juego es divertirse y aprender sobre Ethereum con diferentes ejercicios de codificación al mismo tiempo que asimilas entender los conceptos de Ethereum con algo de práctica.

Ethernaut Detalles
Inspirado en otro juego overthewire.org , cada nivel de Ethernaut es un smart contract que debes hackear para pasar el nivel.
Visita Ethernaut
Visita GitHub Ethernaut


Crypto Zombies

Similar a Ethernaut, Crypto Zombies es un juego en el que puedes construir una fábrica de Zombies para construir tu ejército personal compuesto por soldados únicos.

Una vez que haya creado los zombies, la diversión no ha terminado. Ahora es donde puedes luchar contra los ejércitos de otros estudiantes. Además, también obtienes coleccionables como otros juegos. Al igual que con Ethernaut, también puedes aprender temas específicos de blockchain como ERC721, Web3 o zkSync, lo que hace que esto sitio web bastante completo para tener conocimientos básicos sobre dApp creación.

Crypto Zombies Detalles
Con Crypto Zombies, el jugador puede aprender todos los aspectos de cómo funcionan las cadenas de bloques mientras se divierte.
Visita Crypto Zombies


Conclusión

Como ocurre con muchas cosas en la vida, el mejor aprendizaje es la práctica. Por lo tanto, simple o complejo, ¿por qué no comienza a crear su propio proyecto una vez que sepa los conceptos básicos? Tenemos el privilegio de vivir en una era donde la información es accesible para todos con un nivel infinito de recursos.

Como se puede ver en los enlaces, los cursos técnicos pueden requerir más tiempo, por lo que sería mejor comenzar a aprender los conceptos básicos de los primeros sitios web.

Con las nuevas tecnologías y el crecimiento esperado, estas tecnologías eliminar varios puestos de trabajo, pero habrá escasez de empleo y las empresas no capaz de contratar nuevos talentos porque hay muy pocos profesionales con la habilidades requeridas. Uno de ellos puede ser blockchain y todo lo que rodea esta industria.


“Vive como si fueras a morir mañana. Aprende como si fueras a vivir para siempre.” — Mahatma Gandhi

entry.title: Learn and Earn Crypto
entry.content:
Introduction

Some centuries ago, different organizations across Europe and Asia were accused of conspiracies and polemics. Mostly these accusations were provoked by the information that these sects or groups kept for themselves. or Myth or reality, what cannot be denied is that in the Middle Ages, knowledge was something considered hermetic and exclusive to certain groups that wisdom for them and the exclusive members of their circle.

Fortunately, things have changed in the last decades and in this era of information, we have more access to things we could not have imagined a few years ago. On the other hand, it may be shocking and paradoxical that in this era, we are less cultivated and informed.


"If money is your hope for independence you will never have it. The only real security that a man will have in this world is a reserve of knowledge, experience, and ability." - Henry Ford


Knowledge is enough motivation for most of us to learn about new topics, but apart what if I tell you that apart from learning interesting topics and state of the art technologies you can also get rewarded?

As discussed in previous articles, the best investment you can make is learning. It’s undeniable the benefits that the continuous learning brings in the long term.

Although, learning by itself is already a rewarding and motivating activity, some of use will also appreciate additional bonuses. Keeping us updated is important in the competitive world we all live in. Not just for now, but for future years. By reward, I don’t mean just the new information or benefits you get, but new tokens, coins, or discounts you may get.

This post is not merely about getting free coins, but also new skills that you can get and apply in your professional world. Let’s dig deeper to see what these options are.


Learn to Earn Programs

The first group of this article is related to those programs where you learn the theory, or the basic concepts of a given blockchain or token. In the subsections below, you don’t just learn something new, but you also have the chance of getting rewarded with crypto currencies.

In the Learning Rewards Section you can see different articles, courses and quizzes

These are some of the most famous Learn to Earn programs out there, where you learn interesting new topics and you are rewarded in different manners.

Please bear in mind that these courses do not have any requirements such as “deposit 10 to earn 20, etc.”. Apart from learning and reading/watching the information, the only other requirement is that in some cases you may need to verify and pass the KYC checks.


Coinbase

Coinbase is sometimes criticized for different reasons such as business-related topics (dismissal of employees, business plan) or the trading fees. However, since they started in 2018, they have promoted different initiatives in the crypto community. One of the most famous ones is the Learning Rewards program, where users can earn different tokens. The process is quite easy and just watching a short video and answering some questions you can get some free tokens.

There is no surprise here and you can exchange as soon as you receive. The rewards are not a big amount, but, lately, they tend to occur quite often. Regardless of the rewards, videos are nice to watch and very well done. In addition to these videos, you may also see different articles.

Coinbase Information
One of the first ones to start with this initiative, Coinbase keeps offering these courses from time to time
Coinbase Learning Rewards


Binance

Binance is without any doubt, the largest crypto exchange in the world. In my opinion, the initially based Chinese exchange may be quite annoying with several daily notifications, but Changpeng Zhao’s organization have also several nice initiatives for their customers.

Since 2022, they have followed what Coinbase started and offer some small rewards for watching some videos and answering different questions. There are several courses, and the rewards are quite small. However, it is nice to understand and be aware of new projects, and in addition to learning and getting new ideas, being rewarded for so.

Binance Information
Binance offers several short courses about new altcoins and tradings
Binance Learn and Earn


Cake DeFi

Cake DeFi is a quite new player in the Decentralized Finance sector and now quite known for many people. However, with their current solutions, it is likely that you will get hear from them more and more. They are a company based in Singapore specialized in passive income, being the main pillars of these platform the following s

1. Liquidity mining: as opposed to centralized exchanges, in a DEX, liquidity is needed in order to enable trades between the different pairs. With liquidity mining you provide your crypto assets so other can use these to trade.

2. Staking: Via the Proof of Stake protocol, you lock your tokens to protect the network., and you get rewarded with additional tokens

3. Lending: The last strategy one is income generated from lending your coins to other DeFi participants.

With the available courses, you can at the moment earn the following tokens.

  • DFI (DeFiChain) tokens
  • BTC-DFI Tokens

Both of them are allocated to Staking and Liquidity mining, but after you unfreeze them you can do whatever you want with the coins you got in the courses plus the ones you got from the freeze period.

There is also a course coming soon related to Ethereum, where you will also learn something new and get rewarded.

Cake DeFi Information
With short quizzes you can learn different Decentralized Finance and crypto topics while you have fun
Cake DeFi Learn


Revolut

Revolut is very good for many aspects such as banking, currency conversion, travelling and the super cool features of the app such as virtual cards or instant transfers. However, when it comes to their investment features such as purchasing stock or crypto, there are still some aspects that should be improved.

That’s probably why in order to take off, Revolut has launched a Learn & Earn Program related to Polkadot. Compared to other courses, the lessons are related to one of the most important blockchains and the amounts are also higher.

In addition to the videos, you have also the option to see the glossary, where some important crypto and blockchain terms are explained.

There is no referral program here and you will get those tokens for you. You decide if you want to sell them for fiat or exchange them the moment you receive them.

Revolut Information
The purpose of the program is to learn about a specific cryptocurrency and familiarise with the world of crypto.
Revolut Learn & Earn Site


Technical Courses & Sites

Although the previous courses will reward you with direct tokens and the ones below will not, given the lack of technical skills that we will see in the future, the courses below may have a more relevant reward in upcoming years.

Once we have focused described the most important courses related to business and blockchains, we can also get more technical and in this matter, there are also very good courses to add new skills.


Uniswap

Uniswap, named as the name of the company that created it, is one of the most famous decentralized exchanges. Apart from the exchange and being an example of governance, Uniswap explains clearly very important topics related to DeFi.

They offer some projects located in GitHub and the open-source interface for their protocol is available in GitHub.

On top of these resources and what you may swap or earn in the exchange, you can also build different apps that integrate with the protocol and get paid from their grant program.

Uniswap Information
With the detailed documentation, you can learn about different topics and contribute to UniSwap in infinite ways.
Uniswap Site
Documentation Uniswap
Uniswap Interface


Ethernaut

Probably you have been hearing recently about the Ethereum Merge and the consequences that the fork may have not just for the Ethereum network but the whole crypto scene. Ethernaut is a war game played in an Ethereum Virtual Machine. developed by the OpenZeppelin, Ethernaut is a Web3 application developed with Solidity, where you can also learn this programming language.

The purpose of the game is both having fun and learning about Ethereum with different coding exercises at the same time you assimilate understand the Ethereum concepts with some practice.

Ethernaut Information
Inpspired by other game overthewire.org , each level of Ethernaut is a Smart Contract that you must hack to pass the level.
Visit Ethernaut
Visit GitHub Ethernaut


Crypto Zombies

Similar to Ethernaut, Crypto Zombies is a game where you can build a Zombie Factory to build your personal army composed of unique zombies.

Once you have created the zombies, the fun is not over. It’s now where you can fight other learners’ armies. Furthermore, you also get unique collectibles like other games. As with Ethernaut, you will also learn blockchain specific topics such as ERC721, Web3 or zkSync, making this website quite complete in order to have basic knowledge about dApp creation.

Crypto Zombies Information
With Crypto Zombies, the player can learn every aspect of how blockchains works while having fun.
Visit Crypto Zombies


Conclusion

As with many things in life, the best learning is practicing. Therefore, simple, or complex, why don’t start creating your own project once you know the basics? We are privileged to live in an era where information is accessible for everyone with infinite level of resources.

As you may see from the links, the technical courses may require more time, so it would be better to start learning the basic concepts from the first websites.

With new technologies and the expected growth, these technologies will eliminate several jobs, but there will a job shortage and companies not able to hire new talent because there are too few professionals with the required skills. One of them may be blockchain and everything that surrounds this industry.


"Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever.” — Mahatma Gandhi

entry.title: Benefits of Traveling and How To Get Cheap Flights

link.title: Benefits of Traveling and How To Get Cheap Flights

entry.content:
Introduction

We are in this time of the season where airports are packed and there is a peak of flights when everybody is taking one or more flights to go to the planned destination some weeks before. Despite the petrol price, different strikes, and other inconveniences, after two years of the COVID pandemic, the flight levels are back to 2019 levels and the predictions for the next years are quite optimistic.

This can be explained by the benefits that flying brings and the limitations and restrictions. we had in the last 2 years. The freedom that was taken from us made us value more the possibility of having now the possibility to choose where to go.

Related to this, the first thing we know is that experiences are better than possessions. With the millennials, we have been an increasing prioritization of these experiences over possessions such as houses or cars.

The trip of our dreams is something that we look forward to and our goals is how to fly more and how to find good deals when looking for these trips. It’s something we include in the wishes for the next year.

Although some useless governments are now with the idea of reducing the number of flights or other nonsense regulations, who cares about what they say? Although topics such as pollution or energy management are constant problems, maybe they should be the first ones to apply these rules and avoid their usual useless trips.

Therefore, why not benefit from more and affordable trips during the year? In order to achieve this, there are some steps that we need to consider.

They are not complex at all, but these are some tricks in order to help you with your next trip.

Planning

The first phase is the initial planning phase. It does not require a big effort but leaving everything unplanned or for the last minute will generate unnecessary stress that may ruin our trip. If planned accordingly, this will solve different situations and will get you a better price, flight and stay. In this case, one suggestion would be to start looking for flights some months before the trip. This will ensure that you can analyze the different options and mitigate possible risks.

One of the most heard questions is whether is better to spend 1 month in a location or have 3 trips in different locations.

Although I prefer in general quality over quality, when it comes to trips it is just the opposite. I’m in favor of having more than one. This can be achieved by carefully selecting affordable options. Picking 3 flights of 300 instead of 1 of 1,000 will in my opinion a better choice.

However, this opinion is not based on the price aspect, but also on diversification. For example, if you go to one destination for 1 month and for whatever reason you don’t like it, the weather is very bad, etc. the single trip for the year is ruined. With more options, you diversify more and if you travel 3 or 4 times per year, it’s not likely that all of them will be a bad choice.

Adapt to the options

If you are looking for an exact destination and you suddenly come with a super cheap price, It may look the best thing in the world. However, this will not be always the case.

As we can see in the list of tools, having additional technological support is a must for our search

Despite this may be what we are aiming to achieve, ff you try to hit in the middle of the bullseye, you may be a lifetime waiting for it. Flexibility is the currency that you may use to get more trips with better prices.

It’s just the opposite. The piece of advice here should be starting to look for cheap affordable locations. From that list, you will probably find several destinations that may be attractive to you.

You may start by selecting different price ranges within your budget. Out of all destinations, you may select the ones with the lowest prices and from there you can start selecting which destinations may fit more. Even if some of them may not be very attractive, this can be a good opportunity to discover the next gem.

It’s often where we see that people go to the same destinations: Paris, Madrid, London, etc. These places are normally overcrowded and it’s likely that you have already visited. Why not looking something less mainstream?

As said before, being flexible is the attribute that will open more doors and get you better deals. First of all: direct flights may be more expensive. In this case, there are different options such as different flights, companies, dates or even alternative transport methods.

When it comes to short flights, one alternative could be going by car/train/bus to a close airport. You may have the option of the parking, staying at some friend’s place or even visiting another city before the flight.

In some countries, the train will be quite cheap if booked in advance and, if you are looking for an international flight, another possibility would be to use 2 companies and go first to the connection point. There, you can visit the city (1 day trip). Normally, these cities have many inhabitants, and you may know someone who you can visit or even he may let you stay for the night.

The trick in these cases is to have a good margin between the first and second flight. If for some reason, there is no time left to leave the airport for a short visit to the city, another advice is to get some accessories that will make your trip much easier:

Battery charger, eBook or book, and headphones. Another trick is that without or bad connection to use the laptop to work on work or personal project. If you don’t have Internet connection, you will not get disturbed by constants notifications.

In the last 21 days, prices will skyrocket. You may have seen too many The Simpsons episodes (e.g., when they go to Japan), but it is unlikely that you will get a last-minute deal. These prices are high because are more focused on business travelers who don’t have any other alternative and they (the company) will pay the ticket fare.

Some tools

When it comes to additional help, there are hundreds of tools on the Internet that can be used to keep track the different offers. For example: Kayak, Skyscanner, Google Trips or your own tools.

For example, in my case using Python and MongoDB I have created a tool that checks flights with multiple destination and dates combinations and will store the best option (duration and price) for each combination on each day. The cheapest option on each day is stored and the moment the price goes down, it sends you an alert. Playing with alerts on the service you may use is off the essence.

Since we were discussing the flexibility, I have found that Google Flights allows including many origin and destination airports on the same search. With this useful feature, you can get the best deals with one single search. You can also add notifications. The disadvantage with Google Flights is that some flights may not appear.

This is the basic applicaiton that just collects the flight information such as the price, duration, destination and origin. Once there is a decrease in the price, it sends an email to inform about the change.

Another trick is to book on those airline companies that offer free cancellation. This way you make sure that the highest price you will pay in your search will be the one you already had and everything you get below that is your gain.

Other tricks

Saving in flights means that your budget for doing other trips, restaurants. Instead of going to a 4-start restaurant, you may end up in a 5-star hotel and go to Michelin-starred restaurants. Therefore, you should invest in planning and flexibility because this way you can spend the money in more important things.

Although it may sound strange to you with the recent surge in travel tickets due to inflation, strikes and gas prices, prices are each year lower. This is due to big competition in the airline industry. It’s a regulated sector with several years of history and since World War II prices have been decreasing – after adjusting the price considering inflations –

Then, how do airlines make money? While flying was a premium some years ago, luckily it has been accessible to more and more people. The revenue sources have changed too. As opposed to some decades ago, we that revenues do not come mainly from the ticket, but from other extras such as baggage fees, seat fees, other products, bundles, business trips, etc.

Another question you may have seen is on which day to book the flight. How does this algorithm work?

There is no specific day or hour where you may find the best price. Although you may have heard different opinions based on different sources, there is no specific time where you will get the best price.

However, one thing is to consider. Mondays and Fridays are normally the most expensive days because these are the days where business trips take place. People will get on the plane to a specific destination and come back on Friday. For short trips, this is also the best time in order to spend the whole weekend abroad.

Excluding these days, the best days are Tuesday, Wednesday, and Saturday. Again, this does not mean that they will be always the cheapest flights.

When it comes to months, August is traditionally the most expensive month (some people don’t have any choice for holidays) and Christmas. Therefore, selecting the correct dates may also be a relevant factor.

The rules above are quite general and there is no written rule. It may be that one day a flight ticket from Net York to Amsterdam is 600 and the day after is 300 EUR. For this reason, it’s important to benefit from technology and your favorite tool and get noticed as soon as this change occurs.

Key takeaways

Plan and plan

Don’t leave things for the last minute. Have a good planning will have benefits on both the stress and the price you will end paying for the tickets or any other service you may need.

Start looking in advance is also key. Depending on the type of flight, you should start looking between 2 to 8 months in advance.

Booking at the earliest date does not always mean the cheapest price but waiting for the last minute will always mean a high price.

Flexibility

If you want to travel as much as possible during the year, be flexible. Don’t start looking for one single destination. Open your mind and look for affordable places you may not even know they exist. Learn about them. As mentioned above, it’s key to plan accordingly. Once you have investigated if you would like to go to one of the placed that popped up, see if this is the place where you would like to stay. In many cases, because of the low expectations, these can be a total surprise and you may want to come the year after again.

Tools

entry.title: Affordable Watches Loved by Collectors
entry.content:
Introduction

It’s true that some of the most wanted and known watches will be out of budget for most of us. We have seen that the prices of luxury watches have gone to the roof in the last years. They have been mainly used for investment, hedging and protection against inflation, similar to what’s done with other alternative assets. That’s main reason for having seen the prices in primary and secondary markets skyrocketed. Although even if it said that watches are an investment on many occasions, in most cases this will not be true and even if you are an experienced professional, it would not be advisable to follow these steps.

Anyway, the topic of this article is not to discuss about luxury articles or investments, but the opposite. In this post, the focus is to show some affordable but good-looking watches that will look like a luxury watch and will not disappoint any watch collector.

1. Orient Bambino

We start the list with a fine piece coming from Japan. It may be a non-famous brand for some, but Orient belongs to the Seiko group

The Orient Bambino is possibly one of the best affordable automatic dress watches available on the market today. A piece appreciated even by the most demanding collectors, despite not being a high value jewel.

Essentially, we are dealing in this case with a vintage-style watch with a clean and traditional design equipped with a precise mechanism, whose quality is endorsed by Orient, a Japanese watch brand whose tradition dates back to 1950, although it currently belongs to Seiko, another guarantee of quality.

The best thing about the Orient Bambino is that they move in a fairly affordable price range, so they are an excellent starting point for those who want to start collecting watches without spending a fortune, but who also want to be recognized among others. the connoisseurs in watches.

Due to the success and the sales of the Bambino, there are around 10 version of this watch. If I had to choose one, my favorite one will be the one with the blue dial.

If you are starting with your collection, the Orient Bambino will be ideal as a dress watch

From the first glance you will be fascinated by the contrast of the dial of this Orient Bambino v4 fac08004d model. The dial is characterized by an ocean blue color in the central part that gradually intensifies until it reaches the edges, where it reaches a contrasting black.

The strap is black and made of high-quality leather, a feature that makes it extremely comfortable and easy to wear.

The diameter of the case is 42.5 mm, ideal for any type of wrist, both small and large, the case has a perfectly round shape that is very reminiscent of vintage watches.

All bambino versions are water-resistant up to 30 meters. However, since it is a dress watch and because of the leather strap, swimming with it will not be recommendable.

If you are looking for a classic watch, the best value for money out there may be the Bambino and one of their versions.

Orient Bambino Information
Watch Type: Dress-watch
Price Range: 150 $
Site: Orient Watch

2. Seiko Save the Ocean Series

Since we have introduced one Orient model, there is no doubt we would be also taking about Seiko. If we are presenting affordable and quality watches, there is no doubt that Seiko must be on the list. As it would be impossible to include the different models that could be included in this list, we have decided to include a limited edition of Seiko, which not be known to some.

The new Seiko Prospex Save the Ocean are another example of how Seiko continues to dive deeper and deeper into its passion for underwater watchmaking, of which we have already seen some examples). Back in 2018, at Baselworld, the Japanese manufacturer announced Fabien Cousteau as the new ambassador, grandson of the legendary Jacques Cousteau, the French biologist and oceanographer who taught us to love the oceans.

If you have realized about the name, you may guess that here we are talking about a watch related to the sea. When it comes to orology, this is of course related to diver watches, which also means that they are certified.

The Save the Ocean models are ideal for wearing on the beach (or pool)

There are so many unique models in this limited edition and for that reason it is not possible to focus on all of them. That’s why I will focus on my favorite version of this edition is the Seiko Save the Ocean Black Series. Since they a covered by black PVC, they have a more elegant look

We have already said that there are different models, colors, and type of watches: Turtle, Samurai and these models will adapt to your wrist. Therefore, in this collection you will find multiple versatile options for your collection.

Seiko Save the Ocean
Watch Type: Diver
Price Range: 500 $
Site: Seiko Save The Ocean

3. G-Shock GA-2100

We end our trip to Japan, with a low-cost but high-quality company producer Casio. In the 80s, a small team of engineers from Casio led by Ibe Kikuo

started working a new project. Due to the fragility and delicacy of the watches at that time, their goal was to create an indestructible watch that would be valid for different occasions. One of them was the one related to those workers in the industry.

With not very success at the start, mainly because the sales on the home country did not bring the attention of the Japanese, it started surprisingly to catch the eye of Americans and Europeans. It has now become one of the watches that almost every collector and part of a niche-market.

Ever since, they have brought different breakthroughs to the watch industry. From solar energy to Bluetooth connectivity, it has always remained at the forefront of technology, design, and functionality, accompanying its evolution.

The same that happened with other Casio models, there is no doubt that the GA-2100 will become a classic

G-Shock has created different iconic watches over the years. One of the most recent ones, Nicknamed the CasioOak for having a similar - but much more affordable - design (octogonal shape too) to the one of the Royal Oak from the Audemars Piguet, the G-Shock was an instant hit when it was released in 2020.

The G-Shock GA-2100 is not as rough as other G-Shock models. It’s quite thin. For instance: example: at 11.8mm, it's the thinnest G-Shock currently makes. It's also a predominantly analog piece, with two hands and a physical day indicator. On the other hand, it also has a number of digital complications, including a timer, stopwatch, world time, calendar, and LED light. The most iconic version is the total black CasioOak, and that my seem that it is not easy to read, this is not true once you try it.

In the past, one of the characteristics for which G-Shock had some detractors, is that their design was not the most sophisticated and elegant one. However, with the GA-2100, this is not an argument they may use. The GA-2100 model combines both elegance and robustness, making it an indestructible yet beautiful piece.

Price Range: 100 $
Site: Casio

4. Tissot PRX

The decades of 70s and 80s were good decades for music lovers with special mention to disco music. In 1978, the first Superman was released in the cinemas and Argentina – without Maradona- won their first football world cup home. The PRX had an integrated steel bracelet, a barrel-shaped case which evoked a classic and clean design. In 2021, Tissot decided to reedit this model and generated very good reviews and good opinions.

The name maybe a bit unknown for the users, but they are synonyms of:

The reedition of this watch was an instant hit. It can be used as both dress or sports watch, and it also has some similarities with the Audemars Piguet Royal Oak or the Vacheron Constantin Overseas. Because of the good feedback, Tissot had also the idea of having new versions in 2022, like the chronographer, which is slightly bigger

Conclusion

We have seen watches from different types: sport, dress, or a combination of both. They have been selected taking into account the quality, design and affordable. If you are interested on some luxury watches, there is a link to some classic watches in this article too, but these will also excellent and very good looking in your wrist. entry.title: 9 Products with High Protein Content
entry.content:
Introduction

Together with fat and carbohydrates, proteins are part of the 3 macronutrients that are essential for our body. In this article, we will analyze why they are so important for a healthy lifestyle and some examples of how to integrate them effortlessly into our meals.

Proteins are built from amino acids and are the main components of all cells in the body. While human beings can produce some proteins internally, others must be obtained through the consumption of some aliments and foods.

When you hear about diets, some people blame carbohydrates and fat, but never the third macronutrient. The reason is that our body is able to store fat and carbohydrates. However, it is not possible to store proteins. That’s why it’s important to keep a diet that is rich in protein (either protein or vegetable).

Our body is not just composed of one unique protein, but we have many types that have a specific role. Some of these functions are related to transport, defense, or structure. Without going into detail, the first question you would be asking yourself is how you can get proteins and the ideal meals for this.

When it comes to products, it’s likely that you may have heard about whey protein on more than one occasion. It is a product, which is made up as the main element of the proteins that are extracted from the whey of milk, and that can provide interesting benefits to our health. For this reason, it is widely used as a dietary supplement, especially indicated for practicing sports. However, having this product everyday – even with different flavors – may be a bit boring after several weeks.

For this simple reason, this article collects other products that may help in order to achieve a diversifying and funny diet, from complete natural products.

Quark

Quark is quite trendy recently in several countries and you may see with many flavors. Quark is a type of cheese obtained from the rennet of milk in which proteins are concentrated due to the fact that the largest aqueous portion or whey is separated from the milk after its acidification.

Their protein content is variable, being able to find around 10 to 20% in them. One of the biggest advantages is that quark It is a source of casein, a protein of high biological value that our body can make the most of.

Greek yoghurt

Although the one you may find in your supermarket. may not have many things with the original Yoghurt from Greece, in both cases the content of proteins will give a boost to your daily intake.

A 6-ounce serving of Greek yogurt provides you with 15 to 20 grams of protein, significant amounts of potassium, calcium, vitamin B-12 and B-6, and magnesium. It has low levels of sodium and cholesterol. Furthermore, it does not include too many carbohydrates, compared to the “normal” youghurt.

Skyr

Between cheese and yoghurt, we have the next product coming from a small island in the North. Skyr is a dairy product of Icelandic origin that has been gaining prominence for its health benefits. Although many classify it as a yogurt, it is actually a hybrid between it and a fresh cream cheese since its texture and flavor fall somewhere between the two.

Skyr is usually made from skimmed milk, from which cream or cream has been removed.

Because of this ancient historic process, Skyr is low in fat, but it keeps the milk, which is why it has big content on protein, vitamins, and minerals.

Eggs

Criticized by many not many years ago, eggs are one of the most common products. Apart from the big number of proteins, they are known for having a good quality due to the high proportion of amino acids.

Furthermore, when it comes to combining them, eggs offer a multitude of gastronomic possibilities thanks to their versatility, easiness to prepare and technical properties. You can have them prepared in various ways such as fried, baked, boiled, or even used in some desserts. Obviously, if fried or in desserts (think of French eclairs or the Portuguese Molotof pudding or French eclairs), they will not be very healthy either. However, just a simple omelet (including also Spanish omelet) can be a good boost of proteins in your meals. If you add for example tuna, you will be almost covered for the day.

Very simple to cook (or part of more sophisticated recipes), eggs are one of the most complete sources of proteins

Cod

In general, all fish and meat have a high proportion of protein in their composition. Nonetheless, compared to other fish such as salmon, cod stands out above other varieties of fish, since it has a very low amount of fat, which is an advantage regarding the proportion of protein compared to the rest of the macronutrients.

Despite not being one of the most famous fish by the general public, the truth is that cod offers multiple options in the kitchen to satisfy all kinds of palates. In each country or region, you will see cooked in complete different ways.

Peanuts

Although surprising for some, nuts are two food groups that offer variable amounts of protein and can be very helpful in a vegetarian diet to meet the dietary needs of this macronutrient in the diet. Some examples are almonds or pistachios.

This also happens with peanuts, a legume that, due to its appearance and form of consumption, is often confused with a nut. Peanuts offer interesting amounts of protein in the diet, whether consumed raw or with the classic peanut butter that many are passionate about. Here are some fantastic recipes with peanuts. One of the most popular ones is the peanut butter, which you can combine with many meals.

The disadvantage is that they may be too caloric or contain too much salt, but just taking a bunch of them as a little snack will not harm anyone.

Oatmeal

Oatmeal is one of the most nutritious, versatile, and healthy cereals. Hence, more and more people are betting on incorporating it into their daily diet, mainly for breakfast.

Oatmeal can boast of being one of the cereals with the highest protein content. We can obtain a protein of high biological value, in combination with foods such as milk or legumes.

Its richness in protein (12 grams per 100 grams) and mostly complex carbohydrates (60 grams per 100), makes this cereal an ideal food for athletes. The disadvantage is that it may not be very tasty. For that reason, one solution is incorporating it into shakes.

Lupins

If you take care of your health, most of aforementioned products may be known to you.

I never thought that the last one would be considered a high source of protein and it may be good for some of you to know. Lupins are similar to corn and eaten as snack. In some countries they may be more popular. They are legumes and are perfect to add proteins to vegetarian diets.

It may not be very famous because it was always marginalized and linked to poverty.

Nevertheless, their properties and some research about them have given them a more notorious role. The extraordinary properties of lupins have made this product popular, which is good news, since it is an inexpensive product, very healthy.

Some of the most important attributes of this aliment is that they contain a high source of protein (they contain 40%). They are also. Ideal for diets. Its high fiber content (34%), low levels of fat (less than 6%) and antioxidants.

Microalgae can be an interesting product to consider with the growth of population and lack of resources in the years to come.

Microalgae

The last one is more a product to be considered for the future and the scarcity of some resources, including the increase of population in the current century.

Several genera of microalgae are a valuable source of protein that compete favorably in quantity and quality with traditional products such as eggs, soy, or fish. In addition, they have the ability to synthesize all 20 amino acids and to be a rare source of essential amino acids.

Conclusion

We have seen different ways of having proteins in our daily diet. As we have seen, they have different advantages that will be beneficial for our health.

They are effective for weight loss. Besides, proteins help the development of muscles and improves recovery, thereby contributing to the increase in their strength.

reducing body fat while maintaining muscle, a goal that is often very difficult to achieve through exercise or diet alone.

Not just related to aesthetics or sport, beneficial health effects. Many studies have concluded that the supplement with Whey protein can be a great help to combat certain diseases and to have a better general state of health.

Having said this, it’s now your turn to try the different options or even find new sources of protein. This also does not mean that you should forget about the other 2 macronutrients because they are also essential for a correct functioning of our body.

entry.title: How to Handle Stress
entry.content:
Introduction

While our life is easier compared to some years ago in many aspects, the first world has also led to new trends, problems, or even diseases.

Unknown or ignored in the past in the past, the importance of our mental health is taking the attention it deserves. We need to understand that there are few important things that our mind and body. Not taking care of it, may lead to several issues in our behavior, thinking or mood.

Stress can be characterized as a response to any occasion which is seen, deliberately or unknowingly, as a danger to our safety or happiness. Stress which we experience as unmanageable can be detected as injury by our sensory system and become part of ourselves, damaging our body

Here are some of my tricks to make sure that we fight back and defeat our worst fears and the general stress from our life.

1. HIIT

Low intensity training may be boring and will not cause much an impact once done. However, if we switch to high intensity interval training, in just 20-minute sessions we will not just achieve more than in the low-paced session, but it will also help generate more hormones.

One of these hormones involved in the process is cortisol. Cortisol is known to handle stress

Therefore, if you are changing to go to the next level when it comes to your workout, this may also help reduce the stress.

As with anything, everything in excess is bad. Therefore, too much workout will also not be the best option for de-stressing, because it will also have negative impact in our cortisol levels, being these too high.

2. Meditate

Meditation can provide you with a feeling of peace, harmony, and quietness. This process can help both your general wellbeing. You may use the mediation to relax and focus all the activity on fighting the stress. Not just that but being an expert on this technique can help you stay focused and keeping your inner peace. This means that, like sports, the benefits don’t end once you stop meditating, but in upcoming stressful environments and situations too.

3. Cook some pasta

When it comes to stress, it is also known that some people like cooking to disconnect from the world. Apart from that

Eating complex carbohydrates may be not the best idea if you are trying to lose weight and cut additional calories. However, if you are stressed, why not having your favorite recipe of Your favorite Rigatoni Bolognese or spaghetti amatriciana after a nice workout session? It’s been scientifically proved that eating pasta can increase the serotonin levels, which amongst many tasks, it helps regulate anxiety, mood, and happiness.

On the other hand, you should not abuse of too many carbs. When it comes to food, it must be important to say that ultra-processed food and sugar will have a negative impact. Therefore, it is also good to keep our diet as healthy as possible. It has a big impact in both our body and mental health.

4. Dress up down

Nature is not something in the environment, but it’s something that we can carry with ourselves. That’s why it’s important to choose the correct clothes when starting the day. For example, if you want to reduce eagerness, the best way after having your morning shower is selecting carefully natural clothes (linen, cotton, etc.) that will create a relaxed outfit. If you are stressed, dressing up with tight and elegant clothes may not be the best choice. Having a comfier garment on you will help you have a more easygoing lifestyle.

5. Explore nature

It’s said that people on villages are much happier than those living in big cities with all the traffic, pollution, and noise. It may be easier for some and more difficult for other. Nonetheless, one suggestion for those living in big cities is to try to escape for some days or do some excursions to the beach, lakes, or mountains.

Especially these ones may be the best choice because researchers have proved that since air in high altitude is charged with negative ions (atoms that have lost electrons), these molecules help hikers relax and forget about their problems.

6. Sleep, Sleep & Repeat

The function of sleeping has many processes behind that helps repair our brain and bodies. We all would like to have more time and we often tend to sacrifice our sleeping time in order to get many more things done in the day. However, with this are generating debt that we will pay the days after.

Sleeping does not just make sure that we are more productive the day after, but it helps our whole body to recover and handle the stress accordingly

It’s a vicious circle. Stress leads to insomnia and insomnia leads to more stress.

7. Switch it off

Having multiple devices with thousands of notifications per day is not the best way to stay focused and in good mood. Apart from the constant distractions, some of these messages and pop ups will create negative feelings (war, crisis, hunger, etc.) and increase the level of stress inside our bodies.

For that reason, it is a good idea to keep the number of apps in our phone as reduced as possible and have some focus times defined in our day.

Another piece of advice is that once the workday or week are over, just toggle off the mailbox from your phone and hide the work laptop somewhere else. Even if it would seem that the world will collapse if you do so, try also to minimize the usage of your mobile phone to just those moments that really required.

8. Coffee

This one may be very obvious, but once we get into this habit is not easy to stop. We have discussed what the negative consequences of not sleeping are. The day after we need some energy, and the most accessible drug is a coffee shot. Since it seems to wake us up, we try one after another and some minutes later we are active, but our stress levels have also gone quite up. Cutting drastically coffee may be suicidal for some people. Therefore, a better idea may be to cut it progressively and replace it for healthier drinks such as green, matcha, black, and red tea. These infusions have great benefits when it comes to sleep quality, anxiety, and management of hormones

9. Eat more fruit

Either in solid state or in form of shakes and juices, fruit is very important and has a big impact on our bodies. Not just in our bodies or diet, fruits contain big amounts of different vitamins – for instance C and D-, that help us surpassing the stress threshold level. Therefore, these products can be a good booster to our anti-stress protection.

If for some reason, you think you will not reach the needed vitamin levels, having some supplements will also help us achieve our goals.

10. Breathing Exercises

This one can be a technique that is used just when we are about to blow up or collapse. The trick in those tense situations is to handle our breathing in a good, consistent way with an efficient technique.

You need to be as comfortable as you can and try to evade your mind and focus just on controlling your breathing. For example, put attention to the effect of inspiring through the nose and expiring through the moth. Counting the process will also help if you want to focus just on this activity as much as you can.

11. Spend time with animals

As with nature, spending time with animals will let us avoid our current work and responsibilities, with a more easygoing approach to life. The make us more aware of what the important aspects of life are.

Furthermore, it has been confirmed that being in contact with animals such as dogs or cats activate the oxytocin hormone, which regulates the stress and comfort.

12. Read a novel

When there are many topics going through your mind, what I do is just trying to disconnect and focusing on only single topic. The easiest way to do so is taking the favorite book from the shelf or your book eReader. Although it is said that music may be a better way to disconnect it has been demonstrated with multiple researchs that reading a science or adventure story helps us totally disconnect from our daily tasks immersing ourselves in the story. In any case, you can leave the music for your HIIT session.

13. Switch on the PS4

In the case a book is not enough for you to evade the reality and manage the anxiety, a more active solution would be going to your computer or vide console and playing an adventure or any other type of game.

As it occurs when reading, videogames help us distract ourselves with the preferred games. Videogames are engaging, fun and at the same time they are somehow challenging, getting some rewards. At the same time, as eating pasta, they increase our serotonin levels, having a positive impact on our well-being and mood.

14. Massage session

Massages can be a great complement to an exercise and apart from the muscular regeneration benefits, they also have benefits when it comes to anti-stress techniques.

They help reduce the heart rate, blood pressure and overall improving our sleep quality and mental health, giving a boost to our well-being. Having just a 15–30-minute session can be a shot of good emotions and feelings.

15. Clean your body

To conclude the list, cleaning your body and face might me a good activity to increase our mood and relaxation levels. You may start exfoliating your face, continuing with a long bath with bath salts and candles and putting a face or ice will probably the best idea after a stressful working day.

After the whole process you will leave the bathroom totally rejuvenated – and not just for your skin -.

Next steps

These are some tricks that may help you in your daily tasks and stressful activities. There may situations where you are about to explode. For these times, I encourage to remember these suggestions and apply them to you.

However, remember that like almost everything, practice makes the master. Therefore, why not putting these suggestions to work?
entry.summary: 15 tricks to help you managing your stress, mental health and wellbeing

entry.title: Blockchain Layers Explained
entry.content:
Introduction

If you have been in the crypto or blockchain scene for some time, you may be familiar with the different layers of the blockchain, their functions, and how they interact one with another. However, if you are new, you may hear terms such as L1 or L2 and you may ask yourself what these words are. Don’t worry about this.

In this article we explain not just the different layers but also the importance of each of it. It’s also important to note what they mean and why some tokens may be correlated because they are part of the same layer.

As it occurs with the OSI and the Internet Protocol (TCP/IP) models, we also have different layers in blockchains. The different OSI layers are: Physical, Data Link, Network, Transport, Session, Presentation, and Application. The ones of the Interest Protocol are just 4: Link, Internet, Transport, Application. A similar structure occurs in the Blockchains.

We can distinguish 4 different Blockchain layers, where each one has a specific purpose. Each layer is essential and has some defined functions and roles. They start with Layer 0 and the last one is Layer 3. In order to see the different features, it’s better to see this with some examples.

Layer 0

This protocol is where everything starts and the bottom of the different blockchain protocols that we see later. It’s like the foundations of the building where the different infrastructure, hardware and internet are provided. Although, the other layers would be useless without this initial layer, it’s also the layer that cannot be seen and sometimes ignored.

They allow interconnectivity and integration between traditional and blockchain network.

As mentioned, this is where everything starts. Therefore, they allow other blockchains be built upon them and also that different blockchains are operable between them. In other words, the chains that are created on the layers above are interoperable and compatible thanks to the L0 protocols.

For these characteristics they can be seen as the data transfer layer of the OSI model. Without this one, Bitcoin or Ethereum would not be able to run. Basically, their objective is to interconnect different chains between L1 protocols.

L0 Example
PolkaDot: Web3.0 Interoperability
The most famous example is probably PolkaDot. The goal of the protocol is like the one of a bridge between different L1 blockchains. It allows cross-blockchain transfers of any sort of data or asset, not just tokens. Connecting to Polkadot offers users the potential to interoperate with a wide form of blockchains in the Polkadot network.
Additional information

Layer 1

Layer 1 blockchains are probably the most famous ones for most of us. They are also known as public chains because they have their own structure, encryption, algorithms, technology and mechanisms. These are blockchains that are used to process transactions on their own blockchain and have different utilities.

This protocol consists of the following sublayers: Data layer, Network layer, Consensus layer and Activating layer

Since the transactions need to be processed and validated, the famous Consensus Mechanism (PoW, PoS, etc.) is also inherent to this layer. However, there are also other technical aspects involved such as the block time, the different rules and the dispute resolution. In this layer, we also see different limitations such as scaling.

Algorand is probably one of the most sustainable blockchain due to the technology and consensus mechanism

The goal of Layer 1 blockchains is to achieve the following 3 characteristics:

  • Decentralization
  • Security
  • Scalability

There is a famous term called the Blockchain Trilemma, which says basically that basic chains can just achieve 2 out of 3.

In order to achieve the first 2, scalability is sacrificed and left for later. It’s here where Layer 2 plays a key role too.

Probably these blockchains are the most famous ones to you. Bitcoin, Ethereum, Cardano or Solana are examples of this category and most probably.

L1 Example
Algorand: Offsetting the Carbon Footprint
As opposed to Ethereum, Algorand is a L1 chain, without needing L2 protocols for scability purposes. This is because the consensus mechanism in the Algorand Network is quite different. In this case, a group of validators is selected randomly each time, without needing to have the majority. Algorand is also known as the Green Blockchain.
Additional information

Layer 2

In L1 blockchains, we have seen the Blockchain Trilemma and the problem with scalability. Apart from the Blockchain Trilemma Bitcoin and Ethereum are getting older and what was valid some years ago it is no longer enough, mainly with the increasing number of users. .For example, we have several problems in terms of scalability, speed and gas fees. For that reason, the purpose of L2 blockchains is to enhance the L1 blockchains, with several updates and applications. Via this layer, the processing of the different transactions is also increased. This layer is seen as an auxiliary extension of the L1 protocol .

For example, Ethereum is only able to process around 10 transactions per second. Ethereum is famous for many benefits, but one of the disadvantages is the gas fees. When the network is congested, there is a lot of competition to process the different transactions and it’s when the gas fees considerably increase – the law of supply and demand -. This problem is becoming more often because of the adoption of Ethereum and the applications within the ecosystem.

What the L2 protocol does is to free up Ethereum (L1) from this work. This way, they can process thousands of transactions per second. Ethereum is the layer with more L2 protocols.

Ethereum is famous for having many L2 solutions, but it also applies to other L1 layers such as Bitcoin.There are some examples for Etherum:

  • Polygon is one example running on top of Ethereum. The goal of the Indian platform is to connect blockchains built on Ethereum.
  • Optimism is also developed for Ethereum in order to improve speed and reduce fees in the Ethereum network
  • Immutable X is the second layer protocol used in the NFT Marketplace OpenSea (built on ERC-721), that helps also reduce fees when transacting in the blockchain.

L2 Example
Lightning Network
For the most famous chain, the Lightning Network is a L2 payment protocol layered on top of Bitcoin. It permits fast transactions among participating nodes and has been proposed as an approach to the bitcoin scalability trouble.
Additional information

Layer 3

We have seen that L1 and L2 layers are quite linked to each one, but there are many differences between the different blockchains in these layers. The reason is that they use completely different technologies and processes. The purpose of the third layer is to abstract these differences and make the things much easier for the user. With this, the different ecosystems are interconnectable and can communicate regardless of the technical differences that we can find among them

This is something similar to what’s done in the IP Internet Protocol and the application layer. L3 is the protocol that hosts the DApps. These applications are related to diverse topics such as DeFi, games, or storage apps.

Although Bitcoin is the most known one here, Ethereum is the one that has more applications and has a huge ecosystem. The different cases vary across sectors:

Ethereum aside, Solana is also famous for having many consolidated applications.

Examples of dApps

In order to understand the last layer, these are some examples of complete different applications accessible to users.

1. Uniswap (v2 and v3)

Uniswap is one of the largest DEXs in the space and is powered by the Ethereum blockchain. One of the main differences compared to Binance or Coinbase is that Uniswap operates without an order book. Instead, it uses framework to provide trading liquidity.

2. OpenSea

OpenSea is the world’s largest Non-Fungible Token marketplace which is based on Ethereum ERC-721. In this platform all users can buy, sell, or exchange different items, such as collectibles, gaming articles and other type of goods.

OpenSea allows users to buy, sell, and discover exclusive digital items.

3. Orca

Orca is the first user-friendly cryptocurrency exchange built on Solana. It offers minimal fees and latency compared to Ethereum. There, users can exchange tokens with minimal transaction fees and lower latency than any decentralized exchange on Ethereum. Apart from that, users can provide liquidity to a trading pool to earn a share of trading fees.

4. PancakeSwap

PancakeSwap an be seen as an alternative to UniSwap. As this one, is a decentralized exchange, which allows for trading cryptocurrencies and tokens without an intermediary, and runs on Binance Smart Chain. It is built on an automated market maker system, which relies on liquidity pools between token pairs to enable crypto trades.
